Name: The Promethium Effect - The Idle Clicker MMO
About the game: The Promethium Effect is an immersion into a cutthroat science fiction world where you manage an aggressive asteroid mining corporation. Your goal: Promethium...an incredibly rare element that has been proven to revolutionize the speed of manufacturing and productivity. The more you can get your hands on, the more profitable your corporation. There's just one problem: everyone else wants the same thing, and they want what you have. Your job as head of the corporation is to take on the role of manager, pirate, and bounty hunter. All for the growth of the corporation. Protect your assets, steal from the weak, post bounties and pay others to do your dirty work to get ahead. Blending a fast-paced asteroid shooter with the joy of casual clicker-style games, The Promethium Effect takes casual gaming to a worthy new level.
